mapper.sql: boxOfficeId, registerTypeId, typeOfRightId, processClassificationId, entryName, urgencyLevel, ProjectNotes, userid, managementActivitiesId, receivingTime, cut-offTime
mapper.select: SELECT yw_boxoffice.boxOfficeId, bs_status.statusName,yw_boxoffice.identifier,yw_boxoffice.entryName,yw_boxoffice.ReceivingTime,bs_registertype.registerTypeName,bs_typeofright.typeOfRightName,bs_processclassification.processClassificationName,bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesName, USER.username,yw_boxoffice.urgencyLevel,yw_boxoffice.ProjectNotes,yw_boxoffice.cutOffTime,yw_boxoffice.statusId,yw_boxoffice.overrule,yw_boxoffice.overruleReason FROM yw_boxoffice INNER JOIN bs_registertype ON yw_boxoffice.registerTypeId=bs_registertype.registerTypeId INNER JOIN bs_typeofright ON yw_boxoffice.typeOfRightId=bs_typeofright.typeOfRightId INNER JOIN bs_processclassification ON yw_boxoffice.processClassificationId=bs_processclassification.processClassificationId INNER JOIN bs_managementactivities ON yw_boxoffice.managementActivitiesId=bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesId INNER JOIN bs_status ON yw_boxoffice.statusId=bs_status.statusId INNER JOIN USER ON yw_boxoffice.userid=USER.userId where yw_boxoffice.statusId=#{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT yw_boxoffice.boxOfficeId, bs_status.statusName,yw_boxoffice.identifier,yw_boxoffice.entryName,yw_boxoffice.ReceivingTime,bs_registertype.registerTypeName,bs_typeofright.typeOfRightName,bs_processclassification.processClassificationName,bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesName, USER.username,yw_boxoffice.urgencyLevel,yw_boxoffice.ProjectNotes,yw_boxoffice.cutOffTime,yw_boxoffice.statusId FROM yw_boxoffice INNER JOIN bs_registertype ON yw_boxoffice.registerTypeId=bs_registertype.registerTypeId INNER JOIN bs_typeofright ON yw_boxoffice.typeOfRightId=bs_typeofright.typeOfRightId INNER JOIN bs_processclassification ON yw_boxoffice.processClassificationId=bs_processclassification.processClassificationId INNER JOIN bs_managementactivities ON yw_boxoffice.managementActivitiesId=bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesId INNER JOIN bs_status ON yw_boxoffice.statusId=bs_status.statusId INNER JOIN USER ON yw_boxoffice.userid=USER.userId

SELECT yw_boxoffice.boxOfficeId, bs_status.statusName,yw_boxoffice.identifier,yw_boxoffice.entryName,yw_boxoffice.ReceivingTime,bs_registertype.registerTypeName,bs_typeofright.typeOfRightName,bs_processclassification.processClassificationName,bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesName, USER.username,yw_boxoffice.urgencyLevel,yw_boxoffice.ProjectNotes,yw_boxoffice.cutOffTime,yw_boxoffice.statusId,yw_boxoffice.overrule,yw_boxoffice.overruleReason FROM yw_boxoffice INNER JOIN bs_registertype ON yw_boxoffice.registerTypeId=bs_registertype.registerTypeId INNER JOIN bs_typeofright ON yw_boxoffice.typeOfRightId=bs_typeofright.typeOfRightId INNER JOIN bs_processclassification ON yw_boxoffice.processClassificationId=bs_processclassification.processClassificationId INNER JOIN bs_managementactivities ON yw_boxoffice.managementActivitiesId=bs_managementactivities.managementActivitiesId INNER JOIN bs_status ON yw_boxoffice.statusId=bs_status.statusId INNER JOIN USER ON yw_boxoffice.userid=USER.userId where boxOfficeId = #{boxofficeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into yw_boxoffice (boxOfficeId,identifier, registerTypeId, typeOfRightId, processClassificationId, entryName, urgencyLevel, ProjectNotes, userid, managementActivitiesId, receivingTime,cutOffTime,statusId) values (#{boxofficeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{identifier,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{registertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typeofrightid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processclassificationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entryname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{urgencylevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{projectnotes,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{managementactivitiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receivingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{cutOfftime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update yw_boxoffice
registerTypeId = #{registertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
typeOfRightId = #{typeofrightid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
processClassificationId = #{processclassificationid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
entryName = #{entryname,jdbcType=CHAR},
UrgencyLevel = #{urgencylevel,jdbcType=CHAR},
ProjectNotes = #{projectnotes,jdbcType=CHAR},
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
managementActivitiesId = #{managementactivitiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
receivingTime = #{receivingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cutOffTime = #{cutOffTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
where boxOfficeId = #{boxofficeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update yw_boxoffice set registerTypeId = #{registertypeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, typeOfRightId = #{typeofrightid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, processClassificationId = #{processclassificationid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, entryName = #{entryname,jdbcType=CHAR}, urgencyLevel = #{urgencylevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, ProjectNotes = #{projectnotes,jdbcType=CHAR}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, managementActivitiesId = #{managementactivitiesid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, receivingTime = #{receivingtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cutOffTime = #{cutOfftime,jdbcType=CHAR} where boxOfficeId = #{boxofficeid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
